data.name: janet
data.value: Chat wants to know if Leo’s crocks are in sport mode or not?

data.name: ben
data.value: We’re going to do a little exploring this way. Can I show you what we're about to go explore Janet?

data.name: ben
data.value: It may just look like a lump of ice, but I have a feeling there's something special happening in here.

data.name: janet
data.value: Yeah, what makes you think that?

data.name: ben
data.value: Cause I’ve been here before haha.

data.name: janet
data.value: Did you put something in here?

data.name: ben
data.value: That’s right... it’s a little easter egg for everybody.
